entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
